title: A sanitary block consisting of a bathroom and water closet for each wing of each floor at each mid-l
clause_text: A sanitary block consisting of a bathroom and water closet for each wing of each floor at each mid-landing staircase level/stilt/podium/parking floorof the building for the use of domestic servants engaged on the premises may be permitted by the Commissioner(ii) Other Requirements Bathroom or Water Closet
